author: Marty Johnson
title: Most believe stopping virus is larger priority than saving economy: poll
description: The majority of Americans believe that fighting and stopping the coronavirus outbreak should be the federal government's top priority, ahead of fixing the country's crippled economy,...
content:
The majority of Americans believe that fighting and stopping the coronavirus outbreak should be the federal government's top priority, ahead of fixing the country's crippled economy, a new Public Agenda/USA Today/Ipsos poll finds.
According to the poll, cond… [+1261 chars]
